post.author: lowdragon
post.body:
... i guess now it got me too - programs responding verrrrrry slow and/or crashing, up to the point different GUI elements of my modelling programs are placed wrong.
Dont know if i should hope that this is just a random memory leak or some other program getting in its way. bläää

[edit]no lethal stuff found so far - must be several programs exhausting my system that much
